resources.string:
About MachiKoroPad: 
MachiKoroPad is intended to be used while playing the realworld board/card game Machi Koro. Each turn, you enter your dice roll result and what card you bought - the app keeps track of each player's cards and credits, produces various statistics and predicts who will win! 
 
Boardgame forum: 
see https://boardgamegeek.com/article/23991095 
 
Author: thilo20 
contact me via machikoro@e.mail.de 
 
Copyright and Disclaimer:
